Freya brings a new API for Switchboard,: Freya brings a new API for Switchboard, searchable action entries in Slingshot, new widgets like HeaderBar, animations in the toolkit, improved CSS theming and more. Build feature-full apps easier than ever with Gtk 3.14 & Vala 0.30
A desktop-wide extension service that al: A desktop-wide extension service that allows apps to use functionality exposed by other apps — without prior coordination.
The foundation library for elementary OS: The foundation library for elementary OS apps. Provides powerful widgets like DynamicNotebook, utilities, convenience functions, and more.
Simple, flexible database management. Su: Maklike, buigbare databasis bestuur. Hanteer afstand en op-skyf SQL databasisse, insluitend SQLite. Beskik oor grafiese en in-konsole data kykers, 'n "metadata" uittreksel verwerker wat object auto-find, en meer in staat stel.
An HTTP client/server library with synch: An HTTP client/server library with synchronous and async APIs. Comes with SSL/TLS, cookies, caching, WebSockets, proxy and tunneling support, and more. Goes great with JSON-GLib.
Vala. A Modern, Fast, Open Source Langua: Vala. A Modern, Fast, Open Source Language.
Write fast, native, object-oriented code: Write fast, native, object-oriented code with Vala. It's familiar to anyone who's seen C#, but maintains API/ABI compatibility with standard C, has low memory requirements, and is purpose-built for GObject. You name it, Vala's got it: signals, properties, generics, lambda functions, assisted memory management, exception handling, type inference, async/yield, and more.
